global.invest warning: Contents on this website is not intended as investment advice. Please make your own prudent decisions and independently assume the corresponding risks before trading or investing.

slogan.home s1 2: Running on the secure and reliable NewChain, NewSwap offers the high performance and low cost trades on multiple inter-blockchain assets and newton ecosystem tokens with automated market makers and a dual-token liquidity mining mechanism design. All transaction fees are provided to liquidity providers and governed by the community.
slogan.home s1 3: Everyone is able to issue and trade digital assets

features.text1: Running on NewChain, users own their assets
features.text2: Fast Transaction Speed and Low Transaction Fee
features.text4: System Determines Price with Automated Market Makers(AMM)
features.text5: Multiple Inter-Blockchain Assets and Newton Ecosystem Tokens Support
features.text6: A Dual-Token Liquidity Mining Mechanism Design

newton.base: Newton: Infrastructure for the Community Economy
newton.slogan: Everyone Should Benefit from Economic Growth

business.title: Economic Model
business.text1: The token price in NewSwap is set by the system and a transaction fee of 0.3% will be charged for all trades occurring in NewSwap, all fees are provided to the liquidity providers of the pool.
business.text2: Amount the transction fee, 0.25% will be allocated directly to the liquidity provider and 0.05% will go into the liquidity income pool to back the value of the NewSwap Token (NST).

mining.title: Liquidity Mining
mining.method-text1: Liquidity providers: provide liquidity on specified pools to mine NST by staking LP tokens and NSP (999:1).
mining.method-text2: NSP holders: stake NSP in governance contract to mine NST.

governance.title: Community Goverance
governance.method-text: Stake NSP to join community vote for governance.
